MultiFeature.Name: Iron Durability
MultiFeature.Text: This discipline grants you unmatched toughness and resilience on the battlefield.

Feature.Name: Iron Durability - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

Feature.Name: Iron Durability - Psionic Recovery (2)
Feature.Text: As an action, you can spend up to two Hit Dice. Roll each die, add your Constitution modifier to it, and regain hit points equal to the total.

Feature.Name: Iron Durability -Iron Hide (1–3)
Feature.Text: As a reaction when you are attacked, you gain a +2 bonus to AC for each psi point you spend. You spend these points after learning the attack’s result but before applying its effects.

MultiFeature.Source: Unearthed Arcana 6 - Psionics and the Mystic, Take 2
